Title: Willie Pete
Writer: Aaron Sorkin (created by), Aaron Sorkin (teleplay by), Michael Gunn (story), Elizabeth Peterson (story), Aaron Sorkin (story by), Corinne Kingsbury (story editor), Brendan Fehily (story editor), Ian Reichbach (executive story editor), Camilla Blackett (staff writer), Michael Gunn (story editor), Dana Ledoux Miller (story editor), Adam R. Perlman (staff writer), Matthew Lopez (staff writer)
Actors: Jeff Daniels, Emily Mortimer, John Gallagher Jr., Alison Pill
Plot: Will discovers that someone has leaked information to Nina Howard, the Genoa team uncovers more leads in the story, and Maggie prepares for the Uganda trip. Meanwhile, Jim takes a stand against Romney's press team.
